title: Modularizing Your Dev Environment with Helix
content: Learn how to structure your Helix config for maintainability using languages.toml and efm-lsp.

title: Automating PostgreSQL Setup with Shell Scripts
content: Script teardown and install flows for PostgreSQL with version control and safety checks.

content: Automate global path setup for pnpm across Fedora, WSL, and Windows.

title: Type-Safe Express APIs with Reusable Error Handlers
content: Build scalable Express APIs using higher-order functions and typed responses.

title: Zod + JWT: Validating Auth Payloads Like a Pro
content: Combine Zod schemas with JWT decoding to enforce strict validation on protected routes.

title: PipeWire + Easy Effects: Isolating Mic and Desktop Audio
content: Route mic input through Easy Effects while keeping desktop audio untouched using patchbay.

title: Refactoring Configs for Team-Wide Adoption
content: Scale modular config patterns across teams with formatter definitions and onboarding scripts.

content: Investigate and resolve weak dependencies in Fedora and Debian-based systems.

title: Building a Global Error Formatter for Zod + Express
content: Create a reusable function to format Zod errors into frontend-friendly messages with hints.

title: Crafting Developer-Friendly API Responses
content: Design API responses that are explicit, minimal, and instantly usable for frontend and DX.
